00073 class EGS_POLYGON_SHAPE_EXPORT EGS_TriangleShape : public EGS_SurfaceShape {
00074 
00075 public:
00076 
00077     EGS_TriangleShape(const vector<EGS_Float> &points, const string &Name="",
00078             EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00079     EGS_TriangleShape(const EGS_Float *points, const string &Name="",
00080             EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00081     ~EGS_TriangleShape() {};
00082     EGS_Vector getPoint(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) {
00083         EGS_Float eta_a = sqrt(rndm->getUniform());
00084         EGS_Float eta_b = eta_a*rndm->getUniform(); eta_a = 1 - eta_a;
00085         return EGS_Vector(xo + ax*eta_a + bx*eta_b,
00086                           yo + ay*eta_a + by*eta_b,
00087                           0);
00088     };
00089 
00090 protected:
00091 
00092     EGS_Float xo, yo, ax, ay, bx, by;
00093 
00094 };
00095 
00096 
00116 class EGS_POLYGON_SHAPE_EXPORT EGS_PolygonShape : public EGS_SurfaceShape {
00117 
00118 public:
00119 
00120     EGS_PolygonShape(const vector<EGS_Float> &points, const string &Name="",
00121             EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00122     ~EGS_PolygonShape() {
00123         if( n > 0 ) {
00124             for(int j=0; j<n; j++) delete triangle[j];
00125             delete [] triangle;
00126             delete table;
00127         }
00128     };
00129     EGS_Vector getPoint(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) {
00130         int j = table->sampleBin(rndm);
00131         return triangle[j]->getPoint(rndm);
00132     };
00133 
00134 protected:
00135 
00136     int  n;  // number of triangles
00137     EGS_TriangleShape **triangle;
00138     EGS_AliasTable    *table;
00139 
00140 };
00141 
00142 #endif
